attributes.action: Bank account checks on MPs should be undertaken.
attributes.additional_details: Allow this petition to ensure the poor and disabled in our society are not scrutinised any more unfairly than they are themselves.
attributes.background: It is inequitable for a government to consider bank account checks on benefit claimants before those same checks are undertaken on MP’s who are also receiving public funds

rejection.details: It is not clear what you would like accounts to be checked for. You may wish to resubmit your petition explaining this more clearly.
